phishing.subject: Urgent: Reset Your Password
phishing.body: Your account will be locked. Click https://secure-reset.example.com to reset your password immediately.
phishing.label: phishing
phishing.response: Do not click the link. Report to IT and block sender.

phishing.subject: Invoice Attached
phishing.body: Please see attached invoice and confirm payment.
phishing.label: phishing
phishing.response: Do not open attachments. Verify the sender via phone.

phishing.subject: Team Calendar Invitation
phishing.body: You have been invited to a meeting. Click the link to add to your calendar.
phishing.label: suspicious
phishing.response: Check sender domain and meeting organizer before clicking.

phishing.subject: HR: Update Benefits Info
phishing.body: Update your benefits details by logging into the portal.
phishing.label: safe
phishing.response: Likely safe â€” confirm the sender is internal HR.

phishing.subject: Security Alert: Unusual sign-in
phishing.body: We noticed a sign-in from a new device. Confirm your identity at https://account.example.com
phishing.label: phishing
phishing.response: Do not follow the link. Visit the official site manually and check account activity.

cves.title: Remote code execution in Acme WebServer
cves.summary: A flaw allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted headers.
cves.recommended_action: Apply vendor patch 3.4.2 or mitigate with WAF rule.

cves.title: Improper input validation in Acme Portal
cves.summary: Cross-site scripting vulnerability allowing stored XSS.
cves.recommended_action: Sanitize user input and update to 2.1.3.

cves.title: Privilege escalation in Linux kernel module xyz
cves.summary: Local users can escalate privileges by exploiting race condition.
cves.recommended_action: Upgrade kernel to patched release and audit local processes.

cves.title: Information disclosure in FTP server
cves.summary: Server may leak directory listings under certain configurations.
cves.recommended_action: Disable anonymous access and update configuration.

cves.title: Denial of Service in GraphDB
cves.summary: A crafted query can cause memory exhaustion.
cves.recommended_action: Apply throttling and update to latest patch.

logs.summary: Multiple failed login attempts from 192.168.1.10 on host web-01
SQL injection pattern observed against db-01

notifications.title: Critical: Phishing detected (phish-001)
notifications.body: Phishing email detected from security@bank-payments.com. Confidence 97%. Recommended: Block sender and advise users not to click links.

notifications.title: High: Log anomaly found (log-001)
notifications.body: Multiple failed login attempts from 192.168.1.10 on host web-01. Recommended action: block IP and investigate.

Oct 10 10:02:15 web-01 sshd[1114]: Failed login for user admin from 192.168.1.10
